summary: A warm place to stay in Winterhold. Investigate, perhaps you can inherit the house...
descriptionHtml:
A house rebuild on ruins in Winterhold. The current owner, a shady High Elf, has not been seen in a while. Even though this is not so unusual for this one, you shuld investigate. Perhaps you can inherit the place?

[u]New:[/u] Now you get in the optional section a version with both the Cabin and the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30329/?]stable[/url] in one file. Remember to type »YES« to delete files!

New in 1.8: Changed Rogvir to stay alive at the bandit camp as originally intended. So now you get to fight for your house. But now you get a loft with Alchemy and Enchanting station for the price of fewer loot from Rogvir and Merindil (has anyone found him yet?).

[u]Important:[/u] Delete your old versions with version number in NMM or manually to avoid problems.

Stable: If you like a stable for your horse, you can use my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30329] Winterhold Stable Addon[/url] or the optional file with both the stable and the cabin.
author: Lametrie

files.name: CliffCabinWinterhold
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Rogvir to stay alive at the bandit camp (as originally intended!). Now you have to fight not only him but the bandits too, beware! But at least you find him now, or he finds you...
Reduced the inventory to Rogvir and Merindil (has anyone found him yet?!). That to give me an excuse to install a gratis alchemy and enchanting crafting station on the loft.
Repaired the weapon rack.

files.name: CliffCabin-Winterhold v 1-5
files.changelogHtml:
Mage Statue in the College of Winterhold got the correct position again
Cleaning the mod with TES5Edit

files.name: CliffCabin-Winterhold v 1-6
files.changelogHtml:
changed the dobble bed into two single beds to give your companion a place to sleep.
added a weapon rack, decoration and a table to prepare your meals
reduced the fire sound
all containers are non respawn, both the vanilla and the two new ones (food and salt)
Solution for the floating Stone Quarry from the Hearthfire DLC if you use the Expanded Winterhold Ruins Exterior by Rhinala70.

files.name: CliffCabin-Winterhold v 1-7
files.changelogHtml: Added a chimney to the house to prevent fire ;)

files.name: CliffCabinWinterhold-with-stable
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Rogvir to stay alive at the bandit camp (as originally intended!). Now you have to fight not only him but the bandits too, beware! But at least you find him now, or he finds you...
Reduced the inventory to Rogvir and Merindil (has anyone found him yet?!). That to give me an excuse to install a gratis alchemy and enchanting crafting station on the loft.
Repaired the weapon rack.
